sub_title: Actively Looking for Fulltime & Freelance Opportunities | Marketing Analytics & Reporting | Pharmaceutical, Lifesciences & Healthcare
summary:
Hi there!

I am market analyst by profession. I have about 5 years of experience in the pharmaceutical and lifesciences industry. 

I started my career with a market research and consulting firm where I learned the basics of secondary and primary research. Together with my team, we explored topics related to therapies, medical devices, pharmaceutical packaging, novel technologies and offerings of contract service providers, among many others. The role eventually expanded to include responsibilities of an HR Admin, assisting the head of HR with the regular administrative tasks such as hiring and training, official record keeping and other miscellaneous tasks for ~65 employees. 

The next jump in my career came when I joined one of the leading suppliers of the global biopharma industry, as a market analyst. Building on to the market landscaping skills I developed as a research analyst, the role has helped me in making insight generation more functional. Interactions with seasoned business stakeholders from different functions of the company has helped me have a developer level of  understanding of the cell and gene therapy industry.

Recently, I have moved to the Netherlands and I am on the lookout for full-time and freelance positions which align with my prior experience. In my free time you will find me reading a book with a cup of tea. 

Skills:
Secondary research
Primary research
Database building
Market landscaping
Data analysis
Market forecasting
Dashboarding
Stakeholder management
